Group


Spring cleaning (better late than never). Selling some books. Thought i would post them to the group before trying to flog them on eBay. 

Thanks

Mark  Jones
nixe@...

Books for sale

 

 

The Samurai sword by John Yumoto  $15

 

Naunton Collection of fittings by H.J. Joly 300+pages 4000+ items, book is blue, missing dust cover $225

 

Haynes catalog #3 90+ pages 300+ items  $45

 

Haynes catalog #5 180+ pages, 300+ items, this is a rare original $85

 

3 Coleman/Quirt auction catalogs $90 (for all 3 -- see what it was like years ago)

 

Soft cover book in Japanese, title says Nov 6, '66 #10, shows blades, koshirae, fittings $20

 

Japanese Sword Guard artists by Gary Murtha (signed by author) 80 pages $75

 

JSS/US Bulletin '80-81 $25

 

JSS/US Bulletin 1979 $25

 

MEIBUTSU: Japanese Swords and Sword Fittings in American Collections [Chicago] Token Taikai (1979) $25

 

30+ JSS/US Newsletters from 1991-1997 period, some years complete some not. $15 each if you need me to find a particular one, $275 for the pile (if sold before I start breaking it up).

 

I charge only actual shipping. I will send Media Mail in the U.S. I will mail these anywhere, anyway requested as long as the buyer pays the actual cost.  I can accept Paypal or money order. Inspection return -refund less mailing and my costs.

 

All items are complete as far as I know, they have sat around for a long time, some have wear and tear, some spots from moisture, a couple smell a bit moldy. I can take pictures or provide descriptions or answer questions. Email me at nixe@...  I am a JSS/US director, if you don't know me you are welcome to ask anyone you wish about my reliability. I am located in Ohio USA
